sentences.en: Competition between companies is too fierce for self-regulation to work.
sentences.cn: 公司间的竞争过于激烈，自我调节机制已无法发挥作用。

sentences.en: Competition for the job was intense.
Competition has been fierce to win a stake in Skoda.
sentences.cn: 争夺斯柯达股份的竞争极为激烈。

sentences.en: Enter our competition and you could walk away with £10,000.
sentences.cn: 参加我们的竞赛就有机会轻松赢得1万英镑的奖金。

sentences.en: Going to trade fairs is an ideal opportunity to size up the competition .
sentences.cn: 参加商品交易会是估量竞争规模的理想机会。

sentences.en: He will be banned from international competition for four years.
sentences.cn: 他将被禁赛4年，禁赛期间不能参加任何国际比赛。

sentences.en: He won first prize at the Leeds Piano Competition.
sentences.cn: 他在利兹国际钢琴比赛中荣获一等奖。

sentences.en: I have to change my approach, the competition is too good now.
sentences.cn: 我得改变方法，现在的竞争对手太强。

sentences.en: If competition is the best way to achieve it, then, fine.
sentences.cn: 如果竞争是达到目标的最佳方式，那就这么着吧。

sentences.en: Moreau took gold in the five-kilometre individual pursuit competition.
sentences.cn: 莫罗在个人五公里追逐赛中获得金牌。

sentences.en: Newcastle went out of the competition, losing 2-1 on aggregate.
sentences.cn: 纽卡斯尔队以1比2的总比分被淘汰出局。

sentences.en: That would make the competition between rival suppliers even deadlier.
sentences.cn: 那将使得对立供应商之间的竞争更加你死我活。

sentences.en: The competition should have been rescheduled for a later date.
The deal would have reduced competition in the commuter-aircraft market.
sentences.cn: 这项协议原本会减少通勤航班市场的竞争。

sentences.en: The film faces stiff competition for the Best Film nomination.
sentences.cn: 这部电影在角逐最佳影片提名时面临着激烈的竞争。

sentences.en: The movie industry had chosen to ignore the encroaching competition of television.
sentences.cn: 电影业故意无视电视业的侵犯性竞争。

sentences.en: The very notion of price competition is foreign to many schools.
sentences.cn: 价格竞争这个概念对于许多学校都很陌生。

words.tran_cn: 竞争的；比赛的；求胜心切的

phrases.tran_cn: 恶性竞争；割喉式竞争；剧烈竞争

trans.tran_cn: 竞争，比赛，竞争者，竞争产品
trans.tran_en: a situation in which people or organizations try to be more successful than other people or organizations
